function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through physical contact during the survey data collection process.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of infectious diseases to the survey respondents and survey administrators.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, provide protective equipment, and minimize physical contact during data collection.","Technologies":"Use of digital survey tools and contactless data collection methods.","People":"Survey respondents, survey administrators, and data collectors.","Owner":"Research institution, government health agencies."}]}
